messages.msgSnippet: Mr. Richardson, That is one of the only sites I have found with a large selection. However they do not have the design that I am looking for.  Thank you for
messages.messageBody:
Mr. Richardson,

That is one of the only sites I have found with a large selection.
However they do not have the design that I am looking for. Thank you for
responding so quickly.


Peace,

Matt

--- "M. R. Williams" <amacobra@...> wrote:

---------------------------------
Greetings all,

My appologies if this is off topic, but I am in need
of some assitance.
I am searching for a specific type of kasa/gasa
(rush woven hat) and am
having a hard time finding it online. The type I am
looking for is like
this:

______
______|#####|______
|#################|
|#################|

I hope that made sense. If that style can not be
found a single step
style would work (same thing only minus the top part).
Any assistance you can offer will be greatly
appreciated.


Peace,

Matt

messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, My appologies if this is off topic, but I am in need of some assitance. I am searching for a specific type of kasa/gasa (rush woven hat) and am
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all,

My appologies if this is off topic, but I am in need of some assitance.
I am searching for a specific type of kasa/gasa (rush woven hat) and am
having a hard time finding it online. The type I am looking for is like
this:

______
______|#####|______
|#################|
|#################|

I hope that made sense. If that style can not be found a single step
style would work (same thing only minus the top part).
Any assistance you can offer will be greatly appreciated.


Peace,

Matt
